posts.post_content: @BioPrince: I don't think it's entirely fair to compare this card to [Deflect](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deflect). Target Practice- 1URG

posts.post_content:
I play the Show and Sneak deck and being a combo deck, my favorite spells to misdirect are.  
  
1. Hymn to Tourach (You can pitch a card and still come out ahead!! Is this kind of value even legal??)  
2. Thought Seize (Thats awesome, you get to see your opponents hand and watch him discard himself)  
3. Diabolic Edict (My Emrakul and Progenitus died to this many times but Misdirection gives the opprotunity to refund some value)  
4. Orim's Chant (A storm player is trying to go off with this as backup? I say NO!!, try again later)
posts.html:
I play the Show and Sneak deck and being a combo deck, my favorite spells to misdirect are.

1. Hymn to Tourach (You can pitch a card and still come out ahead!! Is this kind of value even legal??)
2. Thought Seize (Thats awesome, you get to see your opponents hand and watch him discard himself)
3. Diabolic Edict (My Emrakul and Progenitus died to this many times but Misdirection gives the opprotunity to refund some value)
4. Orim's Chant (A storm player is trying to go off with this as backup? I say NO!!, try again later)

posts.post_content:
Sorry AvatarofHOE, I am totally right and you are totally wrong
  
   
Gatherer Text for duress:
  
   
"Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card"
  
   
Unless you are playing multiplayer you have no legal target.
  
   
It is mentioned on several threads and articles:
  
http://community.wizards.com/go/thread/view/75842/25445629/Misdirection\_on\_Duress?pg=1
  
   
   
http://mtgsalvation.com/901-magic-101-targets.html
  
   
http://www.magictraders.com/ubb/Forum1/HTML/024450.html
